titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: The House agreed to the request by Mr. Armey for special consideration: The question will be divided so as to allow a separate vote on the election of the Chaplain.
On agreeing to that portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Donnald K. Anderson, of California, as Clerk; (2) Werner W. Brandt, of Virginia, as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James T. Molloy, of New York, as Doorkeeper; and (4) Reverend James David Ford, of Virginia, as Chaplain.
